# MPSRectNoClip | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Metal Performance Shaders ](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders)

- [ MPSRectNoClip ](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/mpsrectnoclip)

-  MPSRectNoClip 

Global Variable# MPSRectNoClip

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
let MPSRectNoClip: MTLRegion
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/mpsrectnoclip#Discussion)

If this constant is used in an image filter operation, no clipping is done and the entire image is used.
